code: import React from'react';import'./TodoItem.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TodoItem=_ref=>{let{todo,toggleComplete,deleteTodo}=_ref;const deadlineString=todo.deadline?new Date(todo.deadline).toLocaleString():null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:`todo-item ${todo.completed?'completed':''}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:todo.completed,onChange:()=>toggleComplete(todo._id)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{flexGrow:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:todo.text}),deadlineString&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontSize:'0.8em',color:'#666'},children:["Deadline: ",deadlineString]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteTodo(todo._id),children:"Delete"})]});};export default TodoItem;
